description: Try our easy to follow Maple Bacon Hot Cross Bun Sambos recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot cross buns,High protein,Seafood free,Quick & easy breakfast,Easter leftovers,Easter
name: Maple Bacon Hot Cross Bun Sambos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 fruitless hot cross buns, halved, toasted

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add bacon and cook for 68 minutes or until crispy.
Add maple syrup and cook for a further minute or until bacon is coated and sticky.
Divide bacon among toasted hot cross buns and drizzle with a little extra maple syrup to serve.
